sentence.Network_en: The author skillfully fuses these fragments into a cohesive whole.
sentence.Network_cn: 作者将这些片断巧妙地结合成一个连贯的整体.

sentence.Network_en: She steered the car skillfully through the narrow streets.
sentence.Network_cn: 她熟练地驾驶着汽车穿过狭窄的街道.

sentence.Network_en: If the wound is stitched up skillfully, it will hardly leave a mark.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果伤口缝合得好, 不会落下什么伤疤.

list.abs: sadder still , such modus operandi usually preferred by politicians was played up so skillfully that we are forced to believe you are more than a scholar .可悲的是，这样的作案手法通常是首选的政治家发挥了如此巧妙地说，我们不得不相信你是一个多的学者。

when his pole doubled over , he knew something huge was on the other end . his father watched with admiration the boy skillfully worked the fish the dock .当他的鱼竿几乎都要对折的时候，他知道鱼竿另外那端会有着硕大的东西。他父亲用赞许的眼光看着男孩很熟练地把这条鱼沿着码头弄上来。
